Wisdom: الِاعْتِبَارُ يُثْمِرُ الْعِصْمَةَ
enWisdom: Taking example yields [the fruit of] inerrancy

Wisdom: الِاعْتِبَارُ يُفِيدُ [يُفِيدُكَ‏] الرَّشَادَ
enWisdom: Taking lesson is beneficial in [attaining] right guidance

Wisdom: الِاعْتِبَارُ يَقُودُ إِلَى الرُّشْدِ
enWisdom: Taking lesson steers one towards right guidance

Wisdom: اعْتَبِرْ تَزْدَجِرْ
enWisdom: Take lesson and you will be deterred [from evil]

Wisdom: اعْتَبِرْ تَقْتَنِعْ
enWisdom: Take lesson and you will become content

Wisdom: إِنَّ مَنْ صَرَّحَتْ لَهُ الْعِبَرُ عَمَّا بَيْنَ يَدَيْهِ مِنَ الْمَثُلَاتِ حَجَزَهُ التَّقْوَى عَنْ تَقَحُّمِ الشُّبُهَاتِ
enWisdom: Verily the one who has been shown what is in front of him by the examples of the exemplary punishments of the past is prevented by God-wariness from falling into doubts

Wisdom: ذِمَّتِي بِمَا أَقُولُ رَهِينَةٌ وَأَنَا بِهِ زَعِيمٌ إِنَّ مَنْ صَرَّحَتْ لَهُ الْعِبَرُ عَمَّا بَيْنَ يَدَيْهِ مِنَ الْمَثُلَاتِ حَجَزَهُ التَّقْوَى عَنْ تَقَحُّمِ الشُّبُهَاتِ
enWisdom: I am bound by responsibility for what I say and am answerable for itVerily, one for whom examples [of the past] have clearly shown that which was before him of exemplary punishments [given by Allah to wrongdoers] is prevented by God-wariness from falling into dubious [and questionable] actions

Wisdom: دَوَامُ الِاعْتِبَارِ يُؤَدِّي إِلَى الِاسْتِبْصَارِ وَيُثْمِرُ الِازْدِجَارَ
enWisdom: Continually taking lessons leads to perspicacity and bears the fruit of restraint [from evil]

Wisdom: طُولُ الِاعْتِبَارِ يَحْدُو عَلَى الِاسْتِظْهَارِ
enWisdom: The prolonged drawing of lessons [from the past] impels one to be precautious

Wisdom: فِي كُلِّ اعْتِبَارٍ اسْتِبْصَارٌ
enWisdom: In every lesson that is drawn there is discernment

Wisdom: فَازَ مَنْ كَانَتْ شِيمَتُهُ الِاعْتِبَارَ وَسَجِيَّتُهُ الِاسْتِظْهَارَ
enWisdom: Successful is the one who has a habit of taking lesson [from the past] and a tendency towards being precautious

Wisdom: مَنِ اعْتَبَرَ حَذِرَ
enWisdom: One who takes lesson [from the past] is cautious

Wisdom: مَنْ كَثُرَ اعْتِبَارُهُ قَلَّ عِثَارُهُ
enWisdom: One whose consideration [of past events from which he draws lessons] increases, his mistakes decrease

Wisdom: مَنِ اعْتَبَرَ بِتَصَارِيفِ الزَّمَانِ حَذِرَ غِيَرَهُ
enWisdom: One who takes a lesson from the vicissitudes of time is careful of [the evil of] others

Wisdom: مَنِ اتَّعَظَ بِالْعِبَرِ ارْتَدَعَ
enWisdom: One who takes admonishment from the examples [of the past] is deterred [from evil]

Wisdom: مَنْ سَلَبَتْهُ الْحَوَادِثُ مَالَهُ أَفَادَتْهُ [أفادته‏] الْحَذَرَ
enWisdom: One whose wealth is stripped away by disasters, gains from it the benefit of caution

Wisdom: مَنِ اعْتَبَرَ بِالْغِيَرِ لَمْ يَثِقْ بِمُسَالَمَةِ الزَّمَنِ
enWisdom: One who takes a lesson from vicissitudes does not rely on the peacefulness of time

Wisdom: مَنْ فَهِمَ مَوَاعِظَ الزَّمَانِ لَمْ يَسْكُنْ إِلَى حُسْنِ الظَّنِّ بِالْأَيَّامِ
enWisdom: Whoever understands the admonitions of time will not be at ease with positive thoughts about his days

Wisdom: مَنِ اعْتَبَرَ الْأُمُورَ وَقَفَ عَلَى مَصَادِقِهَا
enWisdom: One who considers matters arrives at their [appropriate] criteria

Wisdom: مَنِ اعْتَبَرَ بِغِيَرِ الدُّنْيَا قَلَّتْ مِنْهُ الْأَطْمَاعُ
enWisdom: One who takes lesson from the vicissitudes of this world, his desires lessen
